name: SaveSupplyLot
description:
Creates a new Supply Lot. A Supply Lot lets the store sell products that are not currently available in stock but whose arrival is already scheduled.

Check out our [documentation](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/setting-up-future-inventory--UMSGjooqRfkRbeoh94kS4) about this feature.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent

skuId.description: ID of the SKU whose availability is being scheduled.

warehouseId.description: ID of the warehouse where the SKU will arrive.

supplyLotId.description: ID of the Supply Lot in which the SKU's scheduling should be considered.
